duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as a technical resource for Cost Management within the Platinum, Turnaround Methodology work process.
Support establishment of the overall cost baseline with reporting to monitor and control the turnaround within established tolerances of the baseline, supporting cost-effective project execution.
Integrate the project cost estimate, workhour estimate, and project schedule into the Cost Management baseline.
Develop and maintain cost reports, cash flow/cancellation curves, and contingency analyses.
Estimate costs of deviations and assess impact on total project cost.
Manage monthly closing and accrual for turnaround spend.
Provide supporting data for project execution metrics, external benchmarking, and turnaround closure.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in business or finance. In lieu of degree, 3 or more years of equivalent experience in cost management, project controls, or other related experience will be accepted.
